title: Kaloko-Honokōhau National Historical Park: Permits & Reservations
body: Permits & Reservations         Hawaiian Humpback Whale   Commercial Use Application Form (CUA) KAHO CUA Checklist This application is used for Commercial Use Authorizations (Out-of-Park services). The CUA is for commercial services that originate and terminate outside of the boundaries of the park area.          Hawaiian Monk Seal     KAHO Special Use Permit Application Form   Click here to find info about how to obtain a Special Use Permit KAHO Film Permit Application Form Click here to find info about how to obtain a Filming Permit Conditions For Special Use Permits
